activities: Unify Inc. is a provider of end-to-end enterprise communications, including voice, network infrastructure and security solutions. Unify Inc. is receiving certain business related personal data regarding the employees of its worldwide affiliates in its function as a headquarter of Unify. Such transfer is required to perform certain worldwide tasks for Unify. Unify Inc. may also receive personal data from worldwide customers, vendors, suppliers and other third parties for a number of purposes including internal business, operational, finance, accounting or organizational purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: We will utilize the European Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
